.header-description p:
For a night, a weekend or a week, Andrea Kutzke welcomes you to Lou Cantou B&B in her 1825 manor house, located in the heart of the village of Caux in Hérault.

In summer, breakfast is served on the terrace. Dogs are also welcome. Internet access in both rooms. We speak English und problemlos Deutsch!
#olivier .room-description:
This 50m² family room has two connecting rooms and comfortably accommodates 2 to 5 people.
All on one level, it has a beautiful private bathroom and shared kitchen: a suite in the stately rooms of the 1825 manor house, fully renovated.
Internet access
#olivier .image-card:nth-child(1) .descr: The bedroom with a double bed and its private bathroom.
#olivier .image-card:nth-child(2) .descr: The living room convertible into a bedroom for 3 additional people (one single bed, 1 sofa bed) and a marble mosaic floor.
#olivier .image-card:nth-child(3) .descr: The patio reserved for the olive tree room with access to the shared kitchen.
#olivier .image-card:nth-child(4) .descr: The equipped kitchen: Two electric hobs, fridge, microwave, complete tableware...
#oranger .room-description:
With its shared kitchen, this 55m² gîte can accommodate 2 to 4 people: a double bed and a trundle sofa for two additional comfortable beds (80 x 190 cm).
All on one level, independent bathroom, equipped kitchen.
It's the ideal place for a longer stay, arriving on the day of your choice!
Internet access
#oranger .image-card:nth-child(1) .descr: The bedroom and its four-poster bed.
#oranger .image-card:nth-child(3) .descr: The lush courtyard and its birdsong.
#oranger .image-card:nth-child(4) .descr: The equipped kitchen: Two electric hobs, fridge, microwave, complete tableware...
footer .footer-contact .right a[aria-lab: Open Google Maps for the address 3 avenue Jean Jaurès, 34720 Caux
